message.content: {"given_definition_quality":72,"better_definition":"and; with (used to connect words or people)","sentence":"我和你走。","image_prompt":"Two people, one man and one woman, walking together side by side in a soft apocalypse animation style; the world has a gentle, faded look, with distant ruined buildings and overgrown plants, but the two figures walk peacefully together.","sentence_translation":"I walk with you."}
